Description: Squat dolomite vase: with a flat base and contracted mouth, into which fits a separately made rim. The rim is flat on the top and has a projecting outer edge. Interior well hollowed.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: G. Brunton, 'British Museum expedition to Middle Egypt, 1929-1931 Matmar' (London, 1948), 25 and pl. XXIII, 16 (incorrectly called alabaster).
